io.sarl.maven.docs

Class GenerateMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.sarl.maven.docs.AbstractDocumentationMojo
        • io.sarl.maven.docs.GenerateMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="generate",
      defaultPhase=COMPILE,
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE)
public class GenerateMojo
extends AbstractDocumentationMojo
    Maven MOJO that is generating the documentation for the SARL project.
    Since:
    0.6
    Version:
    io.sarl.maven.docs.generator 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.maven
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.maven.docs.generator

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean addLinkToOperationName
      Indicates if an hyperlink to the operation documentation should be added to each generated operation name.
      protected boolean addYamlHeader
      Indicates if the YAML header should be added.

      Indicates if the sections should be automatically numbered.
      protected boolean kramdown
      Specify if the external Markdown generator is Kramdown.

      Indicates if the Markdown references (addresses in links) should be transformed to their equivalent HTML addresses.

      Indicates if the outline must be automatically generated.

      Indicates the depth level of the section titles that should appear in the outline.

      Specify an external marker that must be written in place of the automatically generated outline.
      protected String outlineStyleId
      The name of the style to be applied to the outline.
      protected String outputDirectory
      Location of the generated documentation.
      protected boolean transformPureHtmlLinks
      Indicates if the pure html references (addresses in the "a" tags) should be transformed to their equivalent HTML addresses.

    • Field Detail

      • outputDirectory

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${basedir}/target/classes",
           required=true)
protected var outputDirectory : String
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Location of the generated documentation.

      • md2html

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true",
           required=false)
protected var md2html : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates if the Markdown references (addresses in links) should be transformed to their equivalent HTML addresses. For example "./repo/file.md" is transformed to "./repo/file.html".
        See Also:
        GenerateMojo.transformPureHtmlLinks

      • transformPureHtmlLinks

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true",
           required=false)
protected var transformPureHtmlLinks : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates if the pure html references (addresses in the "a" tags) should be transformed to their equivalent HTML addresses. For example "./repo/file.md" is transformed to "./repo/file.html".
        See Also:
        GenerateMojo.md2html

      • autoSectionNumbering

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true",
           required=false)
protected var autoSectionNumbering : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates if the sections should be automatically numbered.

      • outlineStyleId

        @Parameter(required=false)
protected var outlineStyleId : String
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        The name of the style to be applied to the outline. If null or empty, no style will be applied to the outline.

      • outlineDepth

        @Parameter(defaultValue="2-3",
           required=false)
protected var outlineDepth : String
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates the depth level of the section titles that should appear in the outline.

        The depth is a range of the depth levels that should be output. The format of the range may be:

        • n for only the depth n;
        • n-m for the depths from n to m;
        • n- for the depths greater than or equal to n;
        • -n for the depths lower than or equal to n;

      • outline

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true",
           required=false)
protected var outline : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates if the outline must be automatically generated.
        Since:
        0.12

      • outlineExternalMarker

        @Parameter(defaultValue="",
           required=false)
protected var outlineExternalMarker : String
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Specify an external marker that must be written in place of the automatically generated outline. This marker is used by the Markdown generator to create automatically the outline, by itself.
        Since:
        0.12

      • kramdown

        @Parameter(defaultValue="false",
           required=false)
protected var kramdown : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Specify if the external Markdown generator is Kramdown. Several internal behaviors are integrated into the documentation generator in order to fix the bugs of Kramdown (mostly related to the unexpected auto-formating of the section header reference marks).
        Since:
        0.12

      • addYamlHeader

        @Parameter(defaultValue="false",
           required=false)
protected var addYamlHeader : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates if the YAML header should be added.

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true",
           required=false)
protected var addLinkToOperationName : boolean
        Description copied from class: GenerateMojo
        Indicates if an hyperlink to the operation documentation should be added to each generated operation name.

    • Method Detail

      • getSkippingMessage

        protected def getSkippingMessage() : String 
        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentationMojo
        Replies the message to display for skipping the execution of this mojo. If this function does not reply a message, the execution is not skipped. If this function replies a message, the execution is skipped.
        Specified by:
        getSkippingMessage in class AbstractDocumentationMojo
        Returns:
        A message for skipping the execution, or null for executing the mojo.

                       throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentationMojo

        Overrides:
        internalExecute in class AbstractDocumentationMojo
        Parameters:
        sourceFolder - the source folder.
        inputFile - the input file.
        relativeInputFile - the name of the input file relatively to the source folder.
